articles.author: Jez Corden
articles.title: Someone added horror music to Starfield's uncanny NPCs — and it's terrifying - Windows Central
articles.description: Starfield's ambient crowd NPCs have an eye-opening problem.
articles.content:
• Starfield is an Xbox and PC exclusive from Bethesda and Microsoft. 
  • It's a massive space RPG built using similar tools that made Skyrim and Fallout 4 possible.

articles.title: New iPhone, new charger: Apple bends to EU rules - BBC
articles.description: A European Union law will require portable devices to have a common charger by 2024.
articles.content:
Apple's latest iPhone will almost certainly feature a USB-C charge point when it is unveiled on 12 September.
The firm's phones currently use its proprietary Lightning adaptor, unlike rivals, includ… [+2194 chars]
